dcterms:description: A dataset containing 350 articles annotated for the presence of propaganda with two labels: propaganda and non-propaganda.

dcterms:description: A unified dataset for emotion classification, containing 15k records for three emotion classes (happy, sad, and angry) and 15k records not belonging to any of the previously mentioned emotion classes.
dcterms:title: Emotion Dataset

dcterms:description: A manually labelled multi-turn dialogue dataset containing 11,318 transcribed dialogues annotated for 7 emotions: neutral, anger, disgust, fear, happiness, sadness, and surprise.
dcterms:title: Daily Dialogue Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 15k records for three emotion classes (happy, sad, and angry) and 15k records not belonging to any of the previously mentioned emotion classes.
